column1: شما چیزی می‌فروشید؟ "You guys selling something?"
Oh, you want something else? All we had was the goat. Your country bombed everything else.
Your country is the evil empire! Your government wants to rule the world! But your values and your spirituality are in the guh-ter!
It doesn't mean we don't still hate you. Now, get out of here!
They are not espies. They came to give us our goat back.
I know! But if we don't help the innocent ones, then we are no better than the Americans are.
Dude, we are espeaking English right now. Does that make sense??
We will have to be quick! The Americans are attacking!
America DID eh-start this war! They eh-started it YEARS ago, when they put their military bases on Muslim holy lands!
Yeup, you don't need us anymore.
